# removedNotification

**Type Property**

A notification that a pasteboard object posts just before an app removes it.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated class let removedNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

The removal class method is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/remove(withName:)]. There is no `userInfo` dictionary.

## Notifications

- **changedNotification**: A notification that a pasteboard object posts when its contents change.
